Nice! That's quite impressive. Can you give me an example of a project you worked on that involved AIML? What was your role in the project and what specific skills did you use?

Some of like, in my college for final year, I developed the app for visual impairment to help them to see the surrounding. In my office, I was worked on a DAS project where with the help of computer vision, it can analysis background and give insight about surrounding cars. Third, currently I am working on AI chatbot. Fourth, also I am working on RAC LLM.
That sounds like a diverse range of projects! Could you tell me more about the AI chatbot project? What was your specific role in that project and what technologies did you use?

Like this chatbot, you can make conversation like human and you can assign prompt to this chatbot like behave as an interviewer or behave as a teacher or a doctor or a lawyer. So as for our prompt, this chatbot behaves.

So, there are like a major part of it that I fill a challenge about the response time. Like if we are developing a chatbot, there is a major role of the response time is there. As per I said, we used LLM there. Because of LLM, its response time was too much to reduce that response time. We need to make like use that small LLM models. But there are one more concern about small LLM models did not provide fast or accurate information. It provides fast like quick information but that information cannot be more accurate. But large model provide slow information but accurate and in depth information. Also there was a problem to convert speech from the text and also problem to convert text from the speech. Likewise, there are not quite full open source model available. So, we face a problem in that.
It sounds like you faced some technical challenges in your project. How did you overcome these challenges? Could you give me an example of how you applied creative thinking to find a solution?

Yes, like, likewise I said, for to overcome these technical challenges, we use VTRIED multiple LLM models and write down their response time, how they are responding and how much faster they can respond. So as per that, we shortlist some models and with the help of a balance of good time range and also good response, likewise V shortlisted that models and using that models, we developed our chatbot. But then there is a problem for text to speech and speech to text. For that I use OpenAI's whisper, voice whisper model to convert voice to text and for text to voice, I use HTTS model.

That's great to hear that you were able to find a solution for these challenges by using various LLM models and combining them with other technologies like OpenAI's whisper and HTTS model. How did you determine which LLM models to use? Were there any specific criteria or approaches you followed in this selection process?

So, in AIM there are, we face a lot of issues like hallucination in LLMs or in image detection or we can say in computer vision, there are not satisfactory result came, like if we want detect small objects or there are multiple bugs we found in Python code. So my approach is very simple, I believe in that like rethink from beginning and I go through from each line of code and read all the code line by line and like give the print statement there. So, and try catch method using try catch method we can analyze this whole whole error. Likewise I also use eichad bots and stack overflow to tackle these issues or errors and I have one habit where I write down these errors in one book. So, in the case future if I go through the same error I can identify it and solve it on my own.

It's great that you have a systematic approach to debugging complex issues. How do you stay updated with the latest advancements in AIML? What resources do you use to keep your skills sharp and up-to-date?

Anyone is good in some task. He will do that task else everyone do likewise. And with the help of each and everyone's effort we do every task. We have one whiteboard where everyone's task is pre-written and using that pre-written task we know what task should I need to do and if I need anyone help I ask them upfront and also I help them also.
